content: have you heard of temperature blankets they re a great way to make memories and document your year in yarn every day for a year you will crochet 1 row using the color that corresponds to the day s high temperature in your area this fun project is beginner friendly and uses only single_crochet stitches we ve selected colors paired them with a temperature range see main image and provided the suggested yarn amounts below feel free to alter your colors and select more of the colors that correspond with your area s climate when crocheting at the recommended gauge each ball of basic stitch anti microbial yarn will give you approximately 12 days of row in that temperature range for example 1 ball of lilac stitches up into 12 days of the temperature range 44 54 degrees f
